about_the_game:
Created by three passionate indie-game lovers, we present to the world a new genre, a Puzzle Royale game! Our goal was to create a non-violent alternative to fun party games like Among Us or Pummel Party, that are easy to pick up and play with a group of friends.

Welcome to Gloam!
Play with 2–10 players in this online Puzzle Royale where your goal is to be the last player alight! Run around a haunted mansion, battling opponents to steal their life-force without perishing to the cold...



You'll need good reflexes and quick-wits to win the fast-paced mini-games! Some which will require raw brainpower, some which are in need of speed, and others are asking for a little pinch of luck!



Collect flames around the map to gain life and power your dash. Without it, you'll find it hard to escape from an unwanted battle, or you'll have a hard time catching up with your prey!



Gloam is a fun cross-platform party game suitable for all ages, that is free of violence or gore, and where we use our brains and agility to out-wit our opponents. Matches are best enjoyed among friends, who can join-in for free via the Android version of the game.



If you perish, come back as a ghost and have fun annoying the survivors by freezing the rooms they are in! You will no longer be able to win the game, but maybe you could influence who does... sneaky!

Features

  • 8 mini-games, with a lot more to be added before the end of early access.
  • Play privately with friends or in online public matches.
  • Customize your character: Colour, skin, and gravestone.
  • Cross-platform play between PC.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 680
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Gloam is a Puzzle Royale game, run around a freezing haunted mansion battling other players in fast-paced mini-games to steal their flames and stay alight the longest! Quick thinking and fast reflexes, a party game for all ages!
